titles.title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the summer district work period.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-799, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 270.

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order to consider a concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate for the summer district work period.
